name: Supersonic Tank Cats
description: Supersonic Tank Cats is a fast race-and-battle karts game featuring unconventional half-kitty and half-combat vehicles. Move in cartoony racetracks as you use hilarious weapons against your rivals to reach the goal before anyone else.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel I5 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel I7 Graphics: Nvidia Gforce GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
